detail_desc: Sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon with flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders. Opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck, and an elasticated, gathered seam at the waist. Lined.

Warm-lined platform Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles. Platform front 3.5 cm, heel 4 cm.
Sandals in soft imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles.
Sandals in soft imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles.

Shopper in braided paper straw with imitation leather details. Two handles at the top, a wide tab with a magnetic fastener and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 15.5x32x35.5 cm.
Shopper in braided paper straw with imitation leather details. Two handles at the top, a wide tab with a magnetic fastener and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 15.5x32x35.5 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Top in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an embroidered detail at the top.
Shopper in jacquard-weave cotton with two handles at the top and decorative tassels. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Depth 13.5 cm. Height without handles 30 cm. Width 36 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with buttons at the top, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. One of the tops has an open chest pocket.

KATE MORGAN x H&M. Cap in a patterned weave with a lightly brushed finish. Embroidery at the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Cotton lining.

Shirt in crisp premium cotton poplin with a full spread collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Fitted top in soft linen jersey with long sleeves and a round neckline with narrow ribbing.
Fitted top in soft linen jersey with long sleeves and a round neckline with narrow ribbing.

Set with a top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in soft jersey. Printed top with press-studs on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Baby Exclusive. Shorts in an organic cotton double weave with an elasticated waist, straps that cross at the back with concealed, adjustable fasteners, and elasticated hems.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft jersey with a nepped texture and flock print. Press-studs down the front, spacious patch pockets at the sides with a raw edge at the top, and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. One patterned pair and one pair in a solid colour.
Tailored, ankle-length trousers in stretch fabric with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and gently flared legs.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves, a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), and a ribbed neckline. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
